chapter.title: Debugging Operations
chapter.para: Operations can be debugged by setting a trace on them. Calls to the operation will be displayed in the console.
A trace can be set in a number of ways:

listitem.para: By right clicking on an operation and selecting Trace from its Debug menu.

By right clicking on a container, e.g. a Class, and selecting Trace All from its Debug menu. All operations belonging to the container (and transitively belonging to all its containers) will be traced.
Via the console, by typing the path to the operation or container and calling traceAll(). Note, calling untraceAll() will stop the trace.
